My pricing model is very simple: I charg: My pricing model is very simple: I charge 20€ per hour. When we have figured out how extensive your project is we can figure out a quote. :)
Contact me via my socials or my email to: Contact me via my socials or my email to get a quote for your project!
We are a company for commission building: We are a company for commission building and painting of miniatures based in Germany. Nice to have you here!

Hi! I'm Kat, I am an avid hobbyist and t: Hi! I'm Kat, I am an avid hobbyist and tabletop wargamer, variety streamer and content creator and I love bringing your ideas to life. If you want to see more of what I do, check out my socials linked below.
